page.title: 13Life Styles.
page.content: Nearby, a mill was being demolished. We had already passed a school, which was standing last week, and had been demolished this week. Lisa and one of our teachers used to work there. The school had been there for nearly a hundred years.' 'On Mottram Road, we passed the Stalybridge Celtic Football Club. Lots of boys from our school support this local team, as well as the major Manchester teams, which are the most favourite. We turned into a the only right turn, which was a street of nearly new houses. At the end of this little estate, is Early Bank Road. This is a very old cart track, which leads into Cheetham Park, and through the Back Fields to our school. Some people who live near our school walk into the Town or Park this way.
